price: Dan Allah menghukum dengan keadilan.  Dan sembahan-sembahan yang mereka sembah selain Allah tiada dapat menghukum dengan sesuatu apa pun.  Sesungguhnya Allah Dia-lah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Melihat.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَقۡضِي بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقۡضُونَ بِشَيۡءٍۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaqḍī bil-ḥaqi wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi lā yaqḍūna bishayin inna al-laha huwa al-samīʿu al-baṣīru
